/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades painted in a palette of colors that add vibrancy to the urban landscape. Cars and motorcycles are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the daily life and movement in the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the colorful buildings below. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting.
